resources.string: Click and read the message of the day

● Use the menu to access the messages from previous days.

● Cofigure the best time to receive the notification with the message of the day.

● Share the desire and with whom you want.

Good reading.

● Beginning you have 5 messages, the rest will be released one per day.

● Messages previously received will appear here.

● As the days pass, the message list will increase, so you can review them and share them.

This application was developed with the thought of bringing to you words of optimism and reflection, messages of thinkers known and unknown. The goal is to help make your day a little better, this is my desire.\n\n
